typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Account Number} as string,
		{Air Booking Description} as string,
		{Airline Alliance} as string,
		{Back Office Tran ID} as string,
		{Booking Date} as date,
		{CO2e kg} as double,
		{Client Master Code Name} as string,
		{Client Name} as string,
		{Coupon Count} as short,
		{Coupon Service Class - Converted Description} as string,
		{Destination Airport Code} as string,
		{Issue Date} as date,
		{Issuing Country Name} as string,
		Kilometers as short,
		{Origin Airport Code} as string,
		{Transaction Type} as string,
		{Travel Type Description} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'testgitcontainer',
	fileName: 'ChristelleTest.xlsx',
	sheetName: '2021 Jan-Feb All columns Air Co',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
